name: Keep Away From Me!
description:
Originally prototyped in 2016, Keep Away From Me! is a fast, frantic, and fun party game. It's designed to split each player's focus between 2 thumbsticks: one that controls a circle that they must protect and another that controls a triangle that they can use to destroy their opponent's circles.

This isn't a complete version of the game, but rather a polished-up version of the prototype. If you have the opportunity to (safely) gather some friends around the couch to try it out, I'd be grateful for any feedback!
